70 ©OECD /CABRI2014 OTHER TITLESIN THE SERIES / AUTRESTITRES DANSLA SÉRIE The former series knownas " Technical Papers " and " Webdocs " merged in November 2003
into " Development Centre Working Papers " . In the new series, former Webdocs 1-17 follow formerTechnical Papers 1 -212as Working Papers 213 -229.
All these documents may be downloaded from: www.oecd-ilibrary.org/development/oecd-development-centre-working-papers_18151949or obtainedvia e - mail(dev .contact@oecd.org).
